availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Morin. Resident in Campbell County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Brooklyn, p. 28. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Gupsers Mill precinct, p. 10. Find A Grave, "Edward P. Morin (1834-1906)," Memorial #87766214, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/87766214 (accessed March 1, 2018).
